property.name: apex.app-param.inputDirectoryOrFilePath
property.description: Specify input path of directory or file. E.g: hdfs://source-namenode-service/user/dtuser/path-to-input-directory

property.name: apex.app-param.outputDirectoryPath
property.description: Specify output directory path on HDFS. E.g: hdfs://destination-namenode-service/user/dtuser/path-to-output-directory

property.name: apex.app-param.maximumReadersForDynamicPartitioning
property.description: Specify maximum readers for dynamic partitioning.

property.name: apex.app-param.minimumReadersForDynamicPartitioning
property.description: Specify minimum readers for dynamic partitioning.

property.name: apex.app-param.numberOfBlocksPerWindow
property.description: Specify number of blocks per window.

property.name: apex.app-param.blockSizeInBytes
property.description: Specify the block size in bytes. By default, the value is 128 MB
